arts.ttl: Atalanta suffer blow as Retegui exits with muscle Injury
arts.sum: Atalanta's 3-2 victory over Empoli was overshadowed by a significant setback as star striker Mateo Retegui was forced off the pitch early due to a muscle injury. The incident occurred just 21 minutes into the match at the Gewiss Stadium, leaving coach Gian Piero Gasperini and the team with concerns as they head into a crucial stretch of the season. The post Atalanta suffer blow as Retegui exits with muscle Injury appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Atalanta 3-2 Empoli: Match Report
arts.sum: Charles De Ketelaere delivered a stunning performance, scoring two goals to secure a thrilling 3-2 comeback victory for Atalanta against Empoli. This win marked Atalanta's 11th consecutive Serie A triumph, allowing them to head into the Christmas break as league leaders. The post Serie A | Atalanta 3-2 Empoli: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.
